headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://*.googletagmanager.com https://*.adpharm.digital https://vercel.live https://connect.facebook.net https://snap.licdn.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https:; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src *; frame-src 'self' https://vercel.live; object-src 'none'; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self';
